recipesJson.name: Butterscotch Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: tim7423
recipesJson.description: FW Butterscotch is a new flavor for me. I decided to add it with my ice cream base. Butterscotch Ripple might work better. I have never tried it.For the ice cream base I added the custard to thicken it up and add to the cream. The hazelnut and meringue I think work good at this ratio for a rich and sweet milky flavor.
